name: Lancer Content Pack
summary: An LCP file is a content pack for Lancer, a tabletop role-playing game (TTRPG). Players can import LCP files into COMP/CON, a web app used to build and manage Lancer characters and encounters. Importing an LCP file into COMP/CON allows a player to view and use the file's contents when building characters and encounters.
